title: Simple Ways to Change Your Bungie Name

steps.title: Go to http://www.bungie.net and log in.
steps.content: Go to http://www.bungie.net and log in. Make sure you log in with the platform that you use to play Destiny 2. For example, if you use Steam to play Destiny 2 , log in with your Steam account or if you play with Xbox, log in with your Xbox account. Each account can change its name once for free, but you also can't pay to unlock more name changes.

steps.title: Navigate to Profile Settings.
steps.content: Navigate to Profile Settings. You can do this by clicking the player icon and then selecting Settings .

steps.title: Enter a new name next to "Bungie Name."
steps.content: Enter a new name next to "Bungie Name." You'll see this in the "Identity Settings" tab.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . The numbers after your selected name will be automatically picked for you, and you cannot manually change them. Names that will be rejected include those that violate Bungie's Code of Conduct, which include names that leave a blank field or become offensive due to Bungie's filtration process. names that mention Bungie, BNG, or impersonate a Bungie employee. names that reveal personal information (like a first or last name, email address, or phone number). names that include hate speech. names that use implicit or explicit sexual terms. names with website addresses. names with profanity.
